summary: Lucy takes a babysitting job, only to find out something evil lurks downstairs.
cast: Skye McCole Bartusiak|Marc Donato|Debbie Rochon|Cas Rooney|Pierre Kennel|Greg Dorchak|Teresa Valenza|Angel Pierce|Alex Cogburn|Fabian Watkins|James Ireland|Ann Hollingsworth Patrie|Joe Calvin Anderson|Glori Renee Euwer|Lisa Marie Kull|David Harper|Angela Pierce|Brian T. Stevenson
director: Directors: Tim T. Cunningham, Natalie Shanks
title: Sick Boy
